committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that any Federal employee serving under a temporary appointment who has completed at least 1 year of service in such position within the preceding 2 years shall be eligible for the Government's health benefits program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that any Federal employee serving under a temporary appointment who has completed at least one year of service in such position within the preceding two years shall be eligible to participate in the Government's health benefits program.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that any Federal employee serving under a temporary appointment who has completed at least 1 year of service in such position within the preceding 2 years shall be eligible for the Government's health benefits program, and for other purposes.
